attributes.action: Knighthoods for the 3 remaining survivors of WW1
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do the decent thing before they die and honour the three remaining survivors of WW1 with a Knighthood in the New Years Honours list. If regretfully one of them passes on before then, then make it postumous. They are more deserving then any actor, singer or lollipop person.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
